column2: Support Vector Machines with Radial Basis Function Kernel
Tuning parameter 'sigma' was held constant at a value of 494.0984
Accuracy was used to select the optimal model using the largest value.
The final values used for the model were sigma = 494.0984 and C = 1.
results$SampleJ <- c(Cytoplasm, Cytoskeleton, `Endoplasmic Reticulum`, Mitochondria, Nucleus, `Plasma membrane`, Postsynapse, Presynapse)
